definition: Zhangdian district of Zibo city 淄博市[Zi1 bo2 shi4], Shandong
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
Zhangdian district of Zibo city 淄博市[Zi1 bo2 shi4], Shandong

sentences.english: At the same time undertake Zhangdian, Linyi, Lianyungang, Jinan double back .
sentences.chinese: 同時承接張店，臨沂，連雲港，濟南雙背。

sentences.english: In 2003, there unearthed a Carved Stone in Zhangdian village, Jiaxian County, Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 2003年，在河南省郟縣張店村，出土一塊石刻。

definition: a friend in times of tribulations (idiom); a friend in need is a friend indeed
to make trouble out of nothing
to have lingering fears/trepidation remaining after a trauma (idiom)
unable to sit or stand still (out of nervousness etc) (idiom)
a shattered mirror put back together (idiom)/(of marriage) to pick up the pieces and start anew/for a separated couple to reconcile and reunite
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
